title: How Does She Tell Her Boyfriend He Needs To See A Doctor About His Deflating Problem?
description:
They have been together for four months but have NEVER gone all the way in the bedroom. Why? Because her boyfriend has a deflating problem *wink wink*.
So how does she politely tell him it's time for him to see a doctor about this problem?
